title: Dish and Dishonesty
episode_desc: Blackadder enters politics in an attempt to avoid Pitt the Younger from striking the Prince off the Civil List.
show_desc: In the Regency era, Mr E. Blackadder serves as butler to the foppish numskull Prince George amidst the fads and crazes of the time.
